item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. New speculative attacks on Apple CPUs (380 points | 136 comments)
2. Boom XB-1 First Supersonic Flight [video] (221 points | 168 comments)
3. Can we get the benefits of transitive dependencies without undermining security? (22 points | 3 comments)

7. We're bringing Pebble back (2518 points | 643 comments)

24. Show HN: Design/build of some elegant parametric speaker cabinets with OpenSCAD (40 points | 17 comments)
25. Beautiful Free Math – Desmos Animated Graphing Calculator (124 points | 18 comments)
26. Janus Pro 1B running 100% locally in-browser on WebGPU (191 points | 19 comments)
27. Instagram deals reveal Meta is offering TikTok creators as much as $300k to post (58 points | 63 comments)
28. HawkEye: A Simple license header checker and formatter in Rust (27 points | 6 comments)
29. Turning the database inside-out (2015) (175 points | 79 comments)
30. Someone at Activision is leaking Slack screenshots to right-wing X users (9 points | discuss)
